categoriesExplanation: The workout video is most suitably classified under the 'Mat' category, evidenced by the title and tags that highlight a 'full body mat workout' and 'gentle workout,' which are consistent with floor exercises typically performed on a mat. The 'Body weight' category is also relevant due to the emphasis on 'bodyweight exercises,' as no additional equipment is mentioned, suggesting the use of body resistance alone. Lastly, there is a mild presence of 'Stretching' elements; the workout is low impact with a focus on moving 'with intention' and includes a 'relaxing warm-up,' which may involve flexibility or mobility work, though specifics on stretching are not extensively detailed. Comments confirm users appreciate the workout's gentle and supportive nature during menstruation, underscoring the low-impact and mat-based characteristics. Other categories were excluded due to the lack of equipment or specific practices like HIIT or Pilates, which were not indicated in the metadata.
